content:

Action:5

I'm moving UP from my current position at (7,2) to start the route towards the key, expecting to head upward and then right across row5 where I'll be able to bypass the wall at row7, col5.

Action:5

I'm moving the avatar upward from row 7 to row 6 to start the path toward the key, expecting the avatar's position to update accordingly as we work our way right on row 5 then down to grab the key.

Action:5
